display_long_description:
Welcome to Aberwla, a dynamic practice tool designed to support classroom-based Welsh learning! This interactive virtual town brings language lessons to life, allowing students to apply their Welsh skills in real-world scenarios and build confidence through practical use.

Learning a language is more than just memorising words—it’s about using them in everyday situations. Aberwla provides a safe, immersive space where players can practice Welsh beyond the classroom, reinforcing vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation in a fun and engaging way.

Visit the supermarket to shop while following a Welsh-language shopping list, or head to the café, where you’ll take orders, serve customers, and complete real-time challenges. Solve puzzles in the museum, forecast the weather at the weather station, or even fly drones on the farm—every corner of Aberwla is packed with mini-games and real-world scenarios that make learning feel effortless and fun.

This isn’t just a game—it’s your own Welsh-speaking world, where you can play, experiment, and build confidence at your own pace. No pressure, no stress—just pure, immersive fun that will have you thinking, speaking, and dreaming in Welsh before you know it!

Developed by Animated Technologies Ltd in collaboration with Gwynedd Council.

Public deployment created in collaboration with and funded by Adnodd.
